swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator

Class ALRGenerator<I extends Item,S extends ALRState<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.ALRGenerator<I,S>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LR0Generator, LR1Generator

    public abstract class ALRGenerator<I extends Item,S extends ALRState<I>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for LR(0) and LR(1) parser generators.
    Author:
    Gero
